ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.summary: Code, prompt and output hiding for Jupyter/IPython notebooks.

build.script:
set -ex
python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
jupyter nbextension install --py hide_code --sys-prefix

about.summary: Code, prompt and output hiding for Jupyter/IPython notebooks.

build.script:
set -ex
python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
jupyter nbextension install --py hide_code --sys-prefix

name: hide_code
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "hide_code" %}
{% set version = "0.7.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "a2a2598dadd7b37b7bfe1b094db3168acdf7c28c371eeca26cbad3e6579d4771" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/h/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win or osx or py < 30]
  script: |
    set -ex
    python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
    jupyter nbextension install --py hide_code --sys-prefix

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - notebook >=4.4.1,<7
    - importlib-metadata  # [py<310]
    - python-pdfkit
  run:
    - python
    - notebook >=4.4.1,<7
    - importlib-metadata  # [py<310]
    - python-pdfkit

test:
  imports:
    - hide_code

about:
  home: https://github.com/kirbs-/hide_code
  license: MIT
  license_file: hide_code/LICENSE
  summary: Code, prompt and output hiding for Jupyter/IPython notebooks.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - scopatz
